data.eml:eml: Contribution to the knowledge of the cavernicolous beetle genus Aspidaphaenops Uéno from Guizhou (Coleoptera: Carabidae: Trechinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tian, Mingyi, Huang, Sunbin (2018): Contribution to the knowledge of the cavernicolous beetle genus Aspidaphaenops Uéno from Guizhou (Coleoptera: Carabidae: Trechinae). Zootaxa 4422 (2): 244-258, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4422.2.5
